glsa.title: phpWebSite: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: phpWebSite is vulnerable to the remote execution of arbitrary PHP script code and to other, yet undisclosed, vulnerabilities.

background.p: phpWebSite is a content management system written in PHP.

description.p: phpWebSite fails to sanitize input sent to the XML-RPC server using the "POST" method. Other unspecified vulnerabilities have been discovered by Diabolic Crab of Hackers Center.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit the XML-RPC vulnerability to execute arbitrary PHP script code by sending specially crafted XML data to phpWebSite. The undisclosed vulnerabilities do have an unknown impact.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All phpWebSite users should upgrade to the latest available version:
